title: Lenovo Shows Huge Optimism Towards AMD’s Instinct MI300X AI Accelerators

title: AMD 3D Stacks SRAM Bumplessly
excerpt: AMD recently unveiled 3D V-Cache, their first 3D-stacked technology-based product.  Leapfrogging contemporary 3D bonding technologies, AMD jumped directly into advanced packaging with direct bonding and an order of magnitude higher wire density.
